dict.acceptation: 鸭子，野鸭；鸭肉；（表示友好的称呼）乖乖；（板球）零分；
躲避，回避；潜入；忽然低下头（或弯下腰）；迅速行进；

sent.orig: Fresh pineapple duck, cashew almond duck, curry duck, edible tree fungus duck, mushrooms duck.
sent.trans: 鲜菠萝鸭，腰果杏仁鸭，咖喱鸭，木耳鸭，香菇鸭。

sent.orig: Two kinds of layer duck, Jinding duck and Nanan duck, were analysed for meat quality.
sent.trans: 选取闽南地区两种主要生产性蛋鸭金定鸭和南安鸭的三龄鸭进行肉质性状和屠宰性能的比较。

sent.orig: A barbary duck is a cross between a wild duck and an ordinary duck.
sent.trans: 芭芭内鸭系由野鸭与普通鸭杂交而成。

sent.orig: Barbary duck is a cross between a wild duck and an ordinary duck.
sent.trans: 巴巴里鸭系由野鸭与普通鸭杂交而成。

sent.orig: Barbary duck a cross between a wild duck and an ordinary duck.
sent.trans: 巴巴里鸭系由“野鸭”与普通鸭杂交而成。
